name: Zero Rabbity
description:
Controls:

Mouse + Left Click: Use your current tool in hand 

1: Select the Pistol

2. Select the Blowtorch

Space: Enter open Doors

Instructions:

Use the Pistol to move around and interact with the environment.

Use the Blowtorch to fix broken wires.

Progress through the doors.

Credits:

Programming and Design Implementation: Kirblee 

Creative design and audio engineer: SpicyBoio 

Gun shot and gun reload sounds by nioczkus on freesound.org. 

Some sound effects made using jsfxr: grumdrig.com/jsfxr
